name: Information Extractor
semantic_context: Extract information from text in a structured format
natural_language_description: 这是 Information Extractor 节点。主要用于: Extract information from text in a structured format

text.name: text
text.description: The text to extract information from
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The text to extract information from

schemaType.name: schemaType
schemaType.description: How to specify the schema for the desired output
schemaType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schema Type | 作用: How to specify the schema for the desired output | 默认值: fromAttributes
available_options: From Attribute Descriptions (值: fromAttributes) - Extract specific attributes from the text based on types and descriptions
Generate From JSON Example (值: fromJson) - Generate a schema from an example JSON object
Define using JSON Schema (值: manual) - Define the JSON schema manually

jsonSchemaExample.name: jsonSchemaExample
jsonSchemaExample.description: Example JSON object to use to generate the schema

notice.displayName: All properties will be required. To make them optional, use the 'JSON Schema' schema type instead
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: All properties will be required. To make them optional, use the 'JSON Schema' schema type instead

inputSchema.name: inputSchema
inputSchema.description: Schema to use for the function

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attributes | 默认值: {}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: systemPromptTemplate (值: None) - String to use directly as the system prompt template
batching (值: None) - Batch processing options for rate limiting
